metadata.title: CVE-2024-23849 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In rds_recv_track_latency in net/rds/af_rds.c in the Linux kernel through6.7.1, there is an off-by-one error for an RDS_MSG_RX_DGRAM_TRACE_MAXcomparison, resulting in out-of-bounds access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23849` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-2.16').
